Question.Subject: Picnik premium.......?
Question.Content: Does anyone have a picnik premium account and password i can borrow/ use ? I need to edit a photo, but not all of the things you can do are there...
Question.ChosenAnswer: You can edit your photos online, since there are so many websites for photo enhacment, and they are free. The best one is 1. Funnywow - http://www.funnywow.com 2. Top 20 websites for photo editing - http://www.squidoo.com/photofunia-style Hope it can help.
